config.title: Frequently Asked Questions
config.subtitle: EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO KNOW
config.description: Can't find your answer? Contact our support team anytime.

faqs.question: How does the 14-day free trial work?
faqs.answer: Start using our platform immediately with full access to all Professional features. No credit card required. After 14 days, choose a plan or downgrade to our free Starter plan. Your data is always safe and exportable.

faqs.question: Can I change plans at any time?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Upgrade, downgrade, or cancel anytime. Changes are prorated and reflected in your next billing cycle. There are no cancellation fees or long-term contracts.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and for Enterprise customers, we also accept wire transfers and purchase orders.

faqs.question: Is my data secure?
faqs.answer: Yes! We use bank-level 256-bit encryption, are SOC 2 Type II certified, GDPR compliant, and perform regular security audits. Your data is backed up daily and stored in secure, redundant data centers.

faqs.question: Do you offer discounts for non-profits or educational institutions?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer 50% discount for registered non-profit organizations and educational institutions. Contact our sales team with your documentation to qualify.

faqs.question: What kind of support do you provide?
faqs.answer: Starter plan includes email support (48h response time). Professional plan includes priority email and chat support (4h response time). Enterprise plan includes 24/7 phone and email support with a dedicated account manager.

faqs.question: Can I import data from other platforms?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer free data migration assistance and provide import tools for all major platforms. Our team can help you migrate your existing data with zero downtime.

faqs.question: Do you offer API access?
faqs.answer: Yes! All paid plans include API access. Starter plan has a limit of 100 calls/day, Professional plan has unlimited API calls, and Enterprise plan includes custom API endpoints and webhooks.

features.title: Real-time Collaboration
features.description: Work together seamlessly with your team in real-time. Share documents, co-edit files, and communicate instantly. See who's online and working on what with live presence indicators.

features.title: Smart Automation
features.description: Automate repetitive tasks and focus on what matters. Create custom workflows, set up triggers, and let the system handle routine operations. Save 10+ hours per week per team member.

features.title: Advanced Analytics
features.description: Get insights with powerful analytics and reporting. Track KPIs, monitor performance metrics, and generate custom reports. Export data to Excel, PDF, or integrate with BI tools.

features.title: 200+ Integrations
features.description: Connect with all your favorite tools and apps. Pre-built integrations with Slack, Google Workspace, Salesforce, Zapier, and more. Full REST API for custom integrations.

features.title: Mobile Apps
features.description: Work from anywhere with native iOS and Android apps. Full feature parity with desktop. Offline mode keeps you productive without internet connection. Push notifications for important updates.

features.title: Enterprise Security
features.description: Bank-level encryption, SOC 2 Type II certified, GDPR compliant. SSO, 2FA, role-based access control, and detailed audit logs. Your data is safe with us.

config.title: Workflow Automation That Just Works

config.content: Say goodbye to repetitive manual tasks. Our intelligent automation engine learns from your team's behavior and suggests optimizations. Create complex workflows with our visual builder - no coding required. Connect triggers, actions, and conditions to automate anything from simple reminders to complex multi-step processes.
